summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Firebase authentication flows and UI rendering. All specified features working correctly without Firebase snapshot listener errors.
passed_tests: Apply page requires login and shows auth alert when not authenticated
Apply page submit button disabled when not authenticated
Dashboard redirects to /login when not authenticated
Firebase test page renders with correct auth status and buttons
Firebase test buttons correctly fail when not authenticated with proper error messages
No snapshot listener errors in console for unauthenticated access
All pages load without Firebase-related console errors
Auth provider properly manages loading and user states
